abstract: Activist hedge fund Steel Partners has submitted proposals to take a majority stake in Sapporo, Japan’s number three brewer. The U.S. hedge fund , which already owns 17.52 percent of the beer maker, wants to up its holding to 66.6 percent, with a view to an eventual takeover.
lead_paragraph: Activist hedge fund Steel Partners has submitted proposals to take a majority stake in Sapporo, Japan’s number three brewer. The U.S. hedge fund , which already owns 17.52 percent of the beer maker, wants to up its holding to 66.6 percent, with a view to an eventual takeover.
